Posts.EditableText: yay! my entertainment returns! well, it was quiet until i submitted a website layout and then got flamed for stealing content from the website. i admit i took all the text content, but it was for a god dam layout submition. lol. then i got called a snotty nosed kid. well ive had a cold for about a week so i supposed its true, and im only 16 so i guess i am just a kid anyway, glad you're back p.s. i cant believe your avatar is still hosted by me after all the shit u gave me lol.
